trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma linha dentro de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewRow class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe DetailsViewRow é usada para representar uma linha individual em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: Cada linha de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle tem um tipo de linha designado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the row types that are valid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os tipos de linha que são válidos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de linha | Descrição | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Uma linha de dados no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Linha de dados vazios no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| To determine the row type of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A linha de dados vazio é exibida em um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>quando não houver registros a exibir. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| A linha de rodapé no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| A linha de cabeçalho no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| Uma linha de pager no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | Para determinar o tipo de linha de um objeto DetailsViewRow, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto DetailsViewRow também tem um estado associado a ele.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O estado pode ser uma combinação bit a bit dos valores na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in edit mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in insert mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| To determine the state of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Valor de estado | Descrição | |-----------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| O objeto DetailsViewRow é uma linha alternativa no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| O objeto DetailsViewRow está no modo de edição. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| O objeto DetailsViewRow está no modo de inserção. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| O objeto DetailsViewRow está no estado normal (padrão). | Para determinar o estado de um objeto DetailsViewRow, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control stores all its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle armazena todas as suas linhas de dados a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a DetailsViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o índice de um objeto DetailsViewRow no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the DetailsViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as células individuais do objeto DetailsViewRow usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Se uma célula contiver controles, você pode recuperar um controle de célula usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>coleção da célula.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>método da célula para localizar o controle, se o controle tiver um <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>propriedade especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar um valor de campo de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>campo coluna ou um campo gerado automaticamente, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>propriedade da célula.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar um valor de campo de outros tipos de coluna do campo em que o valor do campo está associado a um controle, recuperar o controle de célula apropriada e, em seguida, a propriedade apropriada do controle de acesso.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > É possível usar uma expressão de associação de dados diretamente em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>coluna campo sem associação o valor a uma propriedade de um controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o valor do campo é automaticamente colocado em um <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar o valor do campo, você deve recuperar o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>controlar na célula apropriada e, em seguida, use seu <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewRow class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância da classe DetailsViewRow, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial de uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `itemIndex` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `rowType` parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `rowState` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>coleção do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Determina se deve transmitir um evento a hierarquia de controle de servidor ASP.NET da página.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento foi cancelado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>coleção do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RowIndex para determinar o índice de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica somente às linhas de dados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>coleção do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowState property to determine the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RowState para determinar o estado da linha.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O estado pode ser uma combinação bit a bit dos valores na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in insert mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: | Valor de estado | Descrição | |-----------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowState.Alternate`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>é uma linha alternativa no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowState.Edit`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>está no modo de edição. | | `DataControlRowState.Insert`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>está no modo de inserção. | | `DataControlRowState.Normal`| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>está no estado normal (padrão). | Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o estado de uma linha antes de executar uma operação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de linha do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade RowType para determinar o tipo de linha que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objeto representa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid row type values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os valores de tipo de linha válido.

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de linha | Descrição | |--------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowType.DataRow`| Uma linha de dados no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`| Linha de dados vazios no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: A linha de dados vazio é exibida em um controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>quando não houver registros a exibir. | | `DataControlRowType.Footer`| A linha de rodapé no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Header`| A linha de cabeçalho no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | | `DataControlRowType.Pager`| Uma linha de pager no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>. | Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o tipo da linha antes de executar uma operação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> valores.
